roleset.name: to present, give as a gift
roleset.note: BESTOW-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bestow' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from bestow.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The Bravo Zulu award , the Navy accolade for a `` job well done [*] , '']*-1 is bestowed [*-1] on Federal 's workers who [*T*-2] surpass the call of duty .
